item.title: There is a previous repair by a utility company which is subsiding, This is now as wide as the trench and about 1 m in length, The subsidence is getting worse as the filling compacts. The aggregate was not tamped down sufficiently when the repair was made, 22nd February
item.description:
The trench repair is located on Old Bath Road, opposite Pilford Avenue.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 224, Old Bath Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
